stories.title: Germany’s antitrust probe of Google products steps up a gear

stories.text:
10 years ago, I was able to build traffic to a blog via guest posting and just posting regularly(a hobby blog).

Today, I don't think that would work as well.

My main motivation is that I want to get better at attracting the right kind of sustainable attention for my side projects. I've no problem posting on Reddit or Hacker News but I think that traffic disappears as fast as it arrives.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you approach marketing in 2022?
Chile Writes Its Constitution, Confronting Climate Change Head On

stories.text:
My sister is looking to setup a small coworking space. I told her I’d help with internet setup.

In thinking about it, I initially thought wpa2-enterprise and radius. However, then I started to think about users, payments, etc. I poked around a bit for solutions and didn’t find much. Are there no open source offerings around this problem of making it easy to manage enterprise WiFi?

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: Wi-Fi setup for coworking space
You're not FAANG so don't hire like FAANG
